meanings.definition: A diagram consisting of rectangles whose area is proportional to the frequency of a variable and whose width is equal to the class interval.
meanings.sent1: The histogram showed the number of students in each age group.
meanings.sent2: In statistics class, we learned how to create a histogram to represent data visually.
meanings.sent3: At the math party, the histogram was the life of the party, showing off its colorful bars.
meanings.sent4: The histogram of emotions painted a vivid picture of the rollercoaster of feelings.
meanings.sent5: The histogram graphically displayed the distribution of scores, making it easy to understand at a glance.
